languages.text: "Со скорбью сообщаю, что миру-столице был нанесен {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusLate}тяжелый удар{/d}. Рейды ксеносов редко бывают затяжными, но этот продлился намного дольше прочих — враги Человечества уничтожили или угнали в плен миллионы подданных, разрушено большинство оборонительных систем, полностью разорены несколько административных комплексов... Даргонусу понадобится время, чтобы восстановиться в полном объеме".

"I regret to inform you that the capital world has been dealt a {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusLate}serious blow{/d}. Xenos raids are rarely protracted affairs, but this one lasted much longer than any other — the enemies of Humanity eliminated or captured millions of your subjects. Most of the defence systems were obliterated, and several administrative complexes were razed to the ground... It will take time for Dargonus to fully recover."
languages.original_text: "Со скорбью сообщаю, что миру-столице был нанесен {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusLate}тяжелый удар{/d}. Рейды ксеносов редко бывают затяжными, но этот продлился намного дольше прочих — враги Человечества уничтожили или угнали в плен миллионы подданных, разрушено большинство оборонительных систем, полностью разорены несколько административных комплексов... Даргонусу понадобится время, чтобы восстановиться в полном объеме".

traits.locale_text: "I regret to inform you the Capital World was dealt a serious blow. Xeno raids seldom take long, but this one kept going much longer than the others — the enemies of Mankind destroyed or took prisoner millions of subjects. Most of the defense systems were obliterated, several administrative complexes were razed to the ground... It will take a while for Dargonus to fully recover."

"I regret to inform you the Capital World was dealt a serious blow. Xeno raids seldom take long, but this one kept going much longer than the others — the enemies of Mankind destroyed or took prisoner millions of subjects. Most of the defense systems were obliterated, several administrative complexes were razed to the ground... It will take a while for Dargonus to fully recover."

"I regret to inform you that the capital world has been dealt a serious blow. Xenos raids are rarely protracted affairs, but this one lasted much longer than any other — the enemies of Humanity eliminated or captured millions of your subjects. Most of the defence systems were obliterated, and several administrative complexes were razed to the ground... It will take time for Dargonus to fully recover."

"I regret to inform you that the capital world has been dealt a serious blow. Xenos raids are rarely protracted affairs, but this one lasted much longer than any other — the enemies of Humanity eliminated or captured millions of your subjects. Most of the defence systems were obliterated, and several administrative complexes were razed to the ground... It will take time for Dargonus to fully recover."

"I regret to inform you that the capital world has been dealt a {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusLate}serious blow{/d}. Xenos raids are rarely protracted affairs, but this one lasted much longer than any other — the enemies of Humanity eliminated or captured millions of your subjects. Most of the defence systems were obliterated, and several administrative complexes were razed to the ground... It will take time for Dargonus to fully recover."

languages.text: “我很遗憾地告知您，首都世界遭受了{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusLate}惨重的打击{/d}。异形的突袭很少会持续很久，但这次袭击比以往任何一次都要长。数百万臣民惨遭杀害，或是沦为人类之敌的俘虏。绝大部分防御系统遭到破坏，部分行政中心被夷为平地……达戈努斯恐怕要花些时间才能彻底恢复过来。”
languages.original_text: "I regret to inform you that the capital world has been dealt a {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusLate}serious blow{/d}. Xenos raids are rarely protracted affairs, but this one lasted much longer than any other — the enemies of Humanity eliminated or captured millions of your subjects. Most of the defence systems were obliterated, and several administrative complexes were razed to the ground... It will take time for Dargonus to fully recover."

traits.locale_text: “我很遗憾地告知您，首都世界遭受了惨重的打击。异形的突袭很少会持续很久，但这次袭击比以往任何一次都要长。数百万臣民惨遭杀害，或是沦为人类之敌的俘虏。绝大部分防御系统遭到破坏，部分行政中心被夷为平地……达戈努斯恐怕要花些时间才能彻底恢复过来。”

languages.text: «Lamento informarle que el planeta ha sufrido un {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusLate}duro revés{/d}. Las incursiones xenos no suelen ser prolongadas, pero esta ha sido la más duradera que recuerdo. Los enemigos de la Humanidad han matado y secuestrado a millones de sus súbditos. La mayoría de los sistemas de defensa fueron aniquilados y los invasores arrasaron completamente varios complejos administrativos... Dargonus tardará un tiempo en recuperarse por completo».
languages.original_text: "I regret to inform you that the capital world has been dealt a {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusLate}serious blow{/d}. Xenos raids are rarely protracted affairs, but this one lasted much longer than any other — the enemies of Humanity eliminated or captured millions of your subjects. Most of the defence systems were obliterated, and several administrative complexes were razed to the ground... It will take time for Dargonus to fully recover."

traits.locale_text: «Lamento informarle que el planeta ha sufrido un duro revés. Las incursiones xenos no suelen ser prolongadas, pero esta ha sido la más duradera que recuerdo. Los enemigos de la Humanidad han matado y secuestrado a millones de sus súbditos. La mayoría de los sistemas de defensa fueron aniquilados y los invasores arrasaron completamente varios complejos administrativos... Dargonus tardará un tiempo en recuperarse por completo».

languages.text: "Ich bedaure, Ihnen mitteilen zu müssen, dass die Hauptstadtwelt einen {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusLate}schweren Schlag{/d} erlitten hat. Xenos-Angriffe sind selten langwierige Angelegenheiten, aber dieser dauerte viel länger als alle anderen – die Feinde der Menschheit haben Millionen Ihrer Untertanen getötet oder gefangen genommen. Die meisten Verteidigungssysteme wurden ausgelöscht, und mehrere Verwaltungskomplexe wurden dem Erdboden gleichgemacht... Dargonus wird Zeit brauchen, um sich vollständig zu erholen."
languages.original_text: "I regret to inform you that the capital world has been dealt a {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusLate}serious blow{/d}. Xenos raids are rarely protracted affairs, but this one lasted much longer than any other — the enemies of Humanity eliminated or captured millions of your subjects. Most of the defence systems were obliterated, and several administrative complexes were razed to the ground... It will take time for Dargonus to fully recover."

traits.locale_text: "I regret to inform you that the capital world has been dealt a serious blow. Xenos raids are rarely protracted affairs, but this one lasted much longer than any other — the enemies of Humanity eliminated or captured millions of your subjects. Most of the defence systems were obliterated, and several administrative complexes were razed to the ground... It will take time for Dargonus to fully recover."

languages.text: « J'ai le regret de vous informer que le monde-capitale a subi un {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusLate}assaut de grande ampleur{/d}. Les attaques de xénos s'éternisent rarement, mais celle-ci a duré bien plus longtemps que les précédentes. Les ennemis de l'humanité ont éliminé ou capturé des millions de vos sujets. La plupart des systèmes de défense ont été détruits, et plusieurs complexes administratifs ont été rasés... Il faudra du temps à Dargonus pour s'en remettre. »
languages.original_text: "I regret to inform you that the capital world has been dealt a {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusLate}serious blow{/d}. Xenos raids are rarely protracted affairs, but this one lasted much longer than any other — the enemies of Humanity eliminated or captured millions of your subjects. Most of the defence systems were obliterated, and several administrative complexes were razed to the ground... It will take time for Dargonus to fully recover."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai le regret de vous informer que la capitale a subi un assaut de grande ampleur. Les attaques de xénos s'éternisent rarement, mais celle-ci a duré bien plus longtemps que les précédentes. Les ennemis de l'humanité ont éliminé ou capturé des millions de vos sujets. La plupart des systèmes de défense ont été détruits, et plusieurs complexes administratifs ont été rasés... Il faudra du temps à Dargonus pour s'en remettre. »

languages.text: 「残念ですが、首都惑星が{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusLate}深刻な被害{/d}を受けたことを報告します。異種族の襲撃が長引くことは稀ですが、今回は他のものよりはるかに長くかかりました。人類の敵は、何百万人ものあなたの家臣を消すか捕えるかしています。防衛システムはほとんど破壊されて、いくつかの管理施設は焼き払われてしまいました…ダルゴナスが全て元通りになるには時間がかかるでしょう」
languages.original_text: "I regret to inform you that the capital world has been dealt a {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusLate}serious blow{/d}. Xenos raids are rarely protracted affairs, but this one lasted much longer than any other — the enemies of Humanity eliminated or captured millions of your subjects. Most of the defence systems were obliterated, and several administrative complexes were razed to the ground... It will take time for Dargonus to fully recover."

traits.locale_text: 「残念ですが、首都惑星が{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusLate}深刻な被害{/d}を受けたことを報告します。異種族の襲撃が長引くことは稀ですが、今回は他のものよりはるかに長くかかりました。人類の敵は、何百万人ものあなたの家臣を消すか捕えるかしています。防衛システムはほとんど破壊されて、いくつかの管理施設は焼き払われてしまいました…ダルゴナスが全て元通りになるには時間がかかるでしょう」

languages.text: "Üzülerek bildirmem gerekiyor ki başdünyamız {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusLate}ciddi bir darbe{/d} aldı. Zeno baskınlarının uzun sürmesi çok nadirdir ancak bu, diğerlerinden çok daha uzun bir süre boyunca devam etti. İnsanlığın düşmanları, milyonlarca tebaanızı ya yok etti ya da ele geçirdi. Savunma sistemlerinin çoğu imha edildi ve bazı yönetim kompleksleri yerle bir edildi. Dargonus'un tamamen kendine gelebilmesi uzun zaman alacak."
languages.original_text: "I regret to inform you that the capital world has been dealt a {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusLate}serious blow{/d}. Xenos raids are rarely protracted affairs, but this one lasted much longer than any other — the enemies of Humanity eliminated or captured millions of your subjects. Most of the defence systems were obliterated, and several administrative complexes were razed to the ground... It will take time for Dargonus to fully recover."
